author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
By now I hope you've heard of the Stop Killing Games initiative, if not we're in the final stretch for this movement and there's been a lot of recent buzz about it so hopefully we can smash those goals and get the UK and EU governments to talk on the topic of game preservation
